AAW.caption: Text
AAW.doc: Insert some text in the document.
AAW.name: inputtedText

ABC.caption: Below you will be able to set extra margins for your text element. Leave the box unchecked for a default display. (Will ignore any numbers below)
ABC.name: margin_info

AEP.caption: Page break
AEP.doc: Choose if this element will try to enforce a new page before or after itself.
AEP.name: page_break

AEa.caption: Is this element being put into a Multi Column?
AEa.doc: Mark this box if this element is between the Start and End of a multi column element.
AEa.name: into_multi_column

AEb.caption: This Column's Width
AEb.doc: Fit content will make the column have the width of their content. Fit available space will extend the column's width to all horizontal avaliable space in the page.
AEb.name: this_column_width

AEc.caption: Multi Column Name
AEc.doc: The name of the multi column you're wrapping this element within.
AEc.name: multi_column_name

AFS.caption: Is this element being put into the footer?
AFS.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the footer.
AFS.name: into_footer

AFZ.caption: Is this element being put into the header?
AFZ.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the header.
AFZ.name: into_header

AFr.caption: Is this element being put into the background?
AFr.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the background.
AFr.name: into_background

AGF.caption: Repeating structure auxiliary fields. Only use the fields below if this element is being inserted into a repeating structure
AGF.name: repeating_structure_auxiliary_fields

AGG.caption: Structure name
AGG.doc: The unique name of the repeating structure this text is being inserted into.
AGG.name: repeating_structure_name

AGH.caption: Text list
AGH.doc: Optional. If you fill this field, the field "Text" up there will be ignored. With this field you can pass a list to be displayed, for example the first item of the list will appear in the first structure. Leave this one blank and the text up there will be used and every repeated text will be the same, this is ideal for texts that won't change for example labels ("Name", "Phone", etc) and sometimes titles.
AGH.name: text_list
